synopsis.text: There's a whisper among Tokyo's youth about a hidden gem nestled in the backstreets of Harajuku, a shop run by an enigmatic witch named Nina. Accompanied by her unusual pets, a chameleon and a pig, Nina invites her guests into a mysterious realm, delving deep into their hearts to uncover their most profound desires. As an apprentice witch, Nina's mission is to help her clients realize their hidden wishes, but not all dreams lead to a happy ending. As she delves deeper into the human psyche, Nina uncovers the darker side of her magical duties, forcing her to confront the stark reality that her ambitions may not align with her desire to bring solace to the world. In this intriguing tale, customers must navigate their own emotional journeys, making choices that can lead to joy, heartache, or something in between.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
